metadata.title: CVE-2024-53907 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Django 5.1 before 5.1.4, 5.0 before 5.0.10, and4.2 before 4.2.17. The strip_tags() method and striptags template filterare subject to a potential denial-of-service attack via certain inputscontaining large sequences of nested incomplete HTML entities.

criterions.comment: python-django package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
